metadata.description: Agentic coding toolkit: sub-agent orchestration, prompt synthesis, and browser automation for Claude Code

plugins.name: agentic-coding-tools
plugins.description: Complete agentic coding toolkit with skills for sub-agent orchestration (super-agent, cursor-agent, gemini-agent), prompt synthesis commands (handoff-prompt-to, pair-prompt-to, reflect, walkthrough-prompt-to), and specialized agents (browser-qa, ui-clone)

plugins.name: super-agent
plugins.description: SDK-based Claude agent with full Task tool access. Use for executing handoff prompts or spawning nested sub-agents.

plugins.name: cursor-agent
plugins.description: Wrapper around cursor-agent CLI for non-interactive runs (prompt via args/file/stdin) with resume support.

plugins.name: gemini-agent
plugins.description: Wrapper around gemini CLI for non-interactive runs (prompt via args/file/stdin) with resume support.

plugins.name: git-worktree
plugins.description: Create a git worktree with automatic symlinking of gitignored local files (.env*, .ai-*, etc.) from the root worktree.

plugins.name: build-prompt-chain
plugins.description: Build a phased prompt chain with orchestration file from a monolithic implementation prompt.

plugins.name: chrome-screenshot
plugins.description: Extract browser screenshots from session transcripts

plugins.name: read-transcript
plugins.description: Read Claude Code .jsonl transcript files in a token-efficient format. Use instead of Read for conversation content.
